text: Ludwig van Beethoven's Piano Sonata No. 12 in A-flat major, Op. 26, is a piece of music for solo piano. It was written between 1800 and 1801. The sonata was dedicated to Prince Karl von Lichnowsky. The sonata is 20 minutes long. ==Form== The sonata is in four movements: ==References== Category:Compositions in A-flat major Piano Sonata 012
title: Piano Sonata No. 12 (Beethoven)
